cvmx_resp_hdr_t Union Reference

#include <cvm-pci.h>

Detailed Description

Core: Format of the response header in the first 8 bytes of response sent to the host.

Definition at line 116 of file cvm-pci.h.

Data Fields

uint64_t u64
struct {
   uint64_t   opcode:16
 Opcode tells the host the type of response.
   uint64_t   sport:6
 The response is for a host instruction that arrived at this port.

 The destination port or driver-specific queue number.
